name: Alone (itch) (23Wolter)
description:
You are the last survivor of an alien attack on your space ship. You are equipped with a space suit and a weapon that is connected to the ships internal system. But the alien attack has caused a corruption in the system, making your weapons guidance system malfunction, so the weapon can only shoot each 10 second. Be careful what you shoot though...

This game was made as an entry for the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam under the theme: Every 10 Seconds.
